name: Archio XML Views to Gemma OAS

mapping.name: name.#text
mapping.properties: {% if properties.property|default %}{% if properties.property['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Model Property to Gemma OAS.json", properties.property)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Model Property to Gemma OAS.json", properties.property, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
mapping.nodes: {% if node|default %}{% if node['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML View Node.json", node)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML View Node.json", node, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
mapping.connections: {% if connection|default %}{% if connection['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML View Connection.json", connection)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML View Connection.json", connection, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
